roles.name: Supply Chain Manager
roles.description: Coordinates the movement of goods from suppliers to end consumers, optimizing cost, time, and quality across the value chain.

meta.typicalBackground: Operations or logistics degree, strong understanding of inventory management and global trade

sampleUseCase.scenario: During a sudden port strike, the manager reroutes shipments through an alternative hub, leveraging real-time data to avoid major stockouts.

roles.name: International Trade Specialist
roles.description: Facilitates cross-border transactions, manages customs documentation, and ensures compliance with trade agreements.

meta.typicalBackground: International business or economics, familiarity with tariffs, INCOTERMS, and export regulations

sampleUseCase.scenario: A trade specialist helps a local electronics firm navigate newly imposed tariffs on key components by restructuring supply contracts and updating shipping routes.

roles.name: Merchandising Planner
roles.description: Analyzes consumer trends, plans product assortments, and coordinates pricing/promotions to maximize retail performance.

meta.typicalBackground: Marketing or retail management background, strong data analysis and trend forecasting

sampleUseCase.scenario: Using last year's holiday season sales data, the planner adjusts store layouts and promotional bundles, increasing seasonal revenue by 15%.

roles.name: Business Development Officer
roles.description: Identifies and pursues new opportunities to expand markets, forge partnerships, and boost revenue streams.

meta.typicalBackground: Business or sales background, strong relationship-building and negotiation skills
challenges: Cultural and language barriers in global expansions

sampleUseCase.scenario: A business development officer secures a distribution partnership with a major online retailer in Asia, opening a new market channel that doubles the company's international sales.

roles.name: E-commerce Platform Manager
roles.description: Oversees online sales channels, maintains website performance, handles digital marketing and customer experience.

meta.typicalBackground: Tech-savvy marketing or IT background, knowledge of SEO, UX, and payment gateways
challenges: Ensuring data security, preventing cart abandonment

sampleUseCase.scenario: Noticing high cart abandonment rates, the manager implements a streamlined checkout process and retargeting ads, recovering 30% of lost sales.
